label: 請所
本: Medieval Japan:  Essays in Institutional History . Stanford University Press . 1974
著者: Hall, John W. and Mass, Jeffery P.
説明文: Contractual agreement between a central proprietor and (usually) a jitō authorizing the latter to assume full responsibility for conllecting and delivering the annual tax. During Muromachi times ukesho arrangements were made between central owners and shugo (called shugo uke). [地頭、守護、守護請]
